content: **knitted mouses christmas decoration with nordic pattern and stripes in drops fabel theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no fa-485 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** circumference = 17 cm length = 13 cm without tail **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 115 light grey 50 g colour 114 light pearl grey 50 g colour 106 red 50 g colour 400 black 1 mouse weighs approx 14 g without wadding accessories wadding needles drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge ** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
